availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Abraham Unsell and Drucilla Unsell. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850. Farm hand in Ballard County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 298A. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville District, p. 30. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville District, p. 6.
